text: D4 motorway (), formerly Expressway R4 () is a highway in the Czech Republic, southwest from Prague. Sections of the expressway: {| class="wikitable" |- valign=top align=left ! Expressway section ! Length ! Opening ! Notes |- valign=top | Lahovičky (Prague) - Jíloviště | | 1970s | Not a highway (no parallel road, level crossings, pedestrian crossing) |- valign=top | Jíloviště - Skalka (exit Příbram) | | 1970s - end of the 1980s | |- valign=top | Skalka - II/118 | | 2015–2017 | |- valign=top | Mirotice - Třebkov (near Nová Hospoda interchange with I/20) | | 09/2010 | |- valign=top | Nová Hospoda - interchange with I/20 | | 12/2007 | |} ==Images== File: R4 near Voznice (1).jpg | Highway D4 near Voznice.
